channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump snatches Maduro but leaves his regime in charge for now
item.description: For now, there’s no plan spelled out to have American troops or administrators in Venezuela.

item.title: Deploying U.S. troops in Venezuela could become a ‘force protection nightmare’ amid potential insurgency threat, retired colonel warns
item.description: "The risk with Venezuela is that it could be a hostile environment as well, and that could put U.S. forces in great danger."

item.title: WWE Shop Drops Matt Cardona Merch Hours After His SmackDown Return
item.description: WWE Shop already has Matt Cardona merch after his SmackDown return. The "I'm Not Finished" t-shirt is $34.99. Here's Cardona's path back to WWE.

item.title: Countries must move beyond seeing AI as a race, where one side must beat the other
item.description: When it comes to AI, cooperation between countries can yield greater benefits than working alone.

item.title: Opinion: How Trump’s Venezuela raid could worsen America’s affordability crisis
Trump seeks to make Venezuela great again and revive its oil-based economy while affordability crisis lingers in the U.S.
item.description: "We have tremendous energy in that country. It's very important that we protect it. We need that for ourselves."

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
